attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to see what it was all about. Big mistake, I was immediately bombarded with propaganda. This app this nothing but FAKE NEWS!!!!! Beware if you download this app because you support Donald Trump you’re a white supremacist, if you vote for him again you’re a white supremacist! Be on the right side of history by voting blue!!!

attributes.title: ✨ D I S G U S T A N G ✨
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I had some hopes in understanding Trump and his Ideas better, but as soon as I opened the app it was HORRIBLE. The app was such a mess and it was SO unorganized. I literally got a headache due to it. This app is DISGUSTING not also for the disaster but because of how dangerous it is for hacking my social media and feeling no shame. unbelievable! that’s, disgusting.

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: okay so first of all it started crashing on me the second i opened it, and then it started taking up all of my data. It is super slow and has a lot of glitches. I hate this app, and it doesn’t even help show me what trump is trying to do, it’s just irrelevant information.

attributes.title: This app needs to GO
attributes.review: So whether you support his racist/homophobic/Transphobic beliefs is up to you but Trump is a rapist and child molester/trafficker, and it really saddens me that no one is looking into the things he’s done. He’s even admitted to watching women change at his pageants and refusing to leave. Why do y’all want him to be president for 4 more years is beyond me. 🥱🙄

attributes.title: This man ate a bird
attributes.review: I open this app to find the Donald J Trump eats live birds and that just doesn’t sit well with me and my Christian household because why would someone eat birds I mean Donald J Trump has never been a very good president but eating birds crossing the line I think that there needs to be an impeachment trial because he is being cruel to the birds and the birds are part of the FBI if he does not know

attributes.title: Unacceptable
attributes.review: As a white woman living in the greatest country ever. I am highly disappointed with this app! Not only did it take forever for this app to download, but once it did, it kept crashing and I ended up getting a virus on my phone!! This is absolutely despicable and I would like to speak to the manager!!! 🤬

attributes.title: MY FISH DIED
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app my fish could smell the Cheeto from here and it started to do a back float 👁👄👁 THIS APP KILLED MY FISH and worst of all the smell of the Cheeto WAS AWFUL so now I have to live with this constant reminder that I opened this app and what an awful app this is because my fish died 0/10 also I don’t know WHERE TRUMP is because all I can see is a Cheeto

attributes.title: Asks for personal info
attributes.review: I downloaded the app in hopes of gaining a better understanding of Trumps policies, but just to open the app I have to give him a phone number. I don’t feel comfortable with the idea of the government having my phone number. What other data will they collect? Seems risky and unnecessary...

attributes.title: I got cussed out on the phone with one of the company managers
attributes.review: So one of ur company managers caused me out but that’s not the point the point is that this is just not right he promised these things 4 years ago but all he did was let racism and sexism go on so I think this should be taken off  the App Store so please and thank you

attributes.title: Crashed my brand new phone!!!
attributes.review: I got a brand dandy new phone, and the first thing I did was download this gorgeous app. Minutes after downloading this app, my phone crashes. I brought my phone to a technician and they told me that my phone has snaids. This app is the only thing I used, and now I need a new phone!!!
